translation.Message_0_Page_0: Me too. <pause> He was a good man, they all were. <pause> My squad was protecting a group of mostly local politicians. Overtime, the numbers fell. I guess this makes me the lone survivor, and a failed mission.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Well, thank you for the rescue. I figure you expended a fair share of bullets out there, so here, you can have my excess. I'll see you around.
